question: 非常
sourceMnemonic: When an <kanji>injustice</kanji> to what's <kanji>normal</kanji> is being committed, that makes it an <vocabulary>emergency</vocabulary>! As an adjective, this means <vocabulary>extreme</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>unusual</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
